data.message:
The Day is considered “Happy” only because we are honoring & acknowledging all who have greatly sacrificed their lives, their safety, their happiness, liberty & freedom! To ensure we have our liberty, safety & freedom!
Yes! That’s why I say proudly, “Happy Veterans Day” to all who dare to step up to the plate & stare danger & death in the face, day after day until their tour of duty is up... We salute you, we celebrate you 🎉 & last but not least we admire you for your courage & bravery!!! May the true Blessings of God be with each & every Soldier on this your Special Day that’s set aside just for you!!!! To say, “Thank you” for your service to the United States 🇺🇸 of AMERICA! Our HOME!♥️♥️♥️♥️♥️♥️♥️♥️♥️

replies.message: Very well said I salute you
What a wonderful tribute to all Veterans!
Spot on, best way to honor our warriors, give them the health care they worked for. Mental and physical.
John Vanutrecht Aww, Thank you! 🙏 I felt moved to speak up & say something in honor & respect to those who deserve it!
Helga Henry That’s so kind of you to say, Thank you 🙏 so much!
Gerrene Maroney What a nice compliment, Thank you! 🙏 Yes, I agree! They need to be taken care of most definitely! My prayers are with them...
Navy SUB vet here. We love folks like you. Never change and that's a order!
Thanks that was very well said we salute you
Joey Floyd  “YES SIR” always & forever loyal to those in service, I can relate, lol! I’m a warrior in Spiritual battles...
Thomas Juarez  It’s for you all! Thanks 🙏 though for recognizing my acknowledgment! I could get used to this, lol!😉

Thomas Juarez You’re so very very welcome indeed! 🙏 Thanks for your salutations to me... I just love 💕 encouraging, inspiring & motivating others & when it comes back... it’s just “icing on the cake” as it were! Blessings to you & yours. 🙏
